WSCp MARK 7.7 On idel hi me wurðiað, & manna lare & bebodu lærað.
WSCp MARK 7.8 Soþlice ge forlætað Godes bebod, & healdað manna laga, þweala ceaca & calica
& manega oþre þylce ðing ge doð.
WSCp MARK 7.9 Ða sæde he him,
wel ge on idel dydon Godes bebod þæt ge eower laga healdon.
WSCp MARK 7.10 Moyses cwæð,
wurða þinne fæder & þine modor;
& se ðe wyrigþ his fæder & his modor, swelte se deaþe.
WSCp MARK 7.11 Soðlice ge cweþað,

gif hwa segð his fæder & meder corban, þæt is, on ure geðeode gyfu, gif hwylc is of me þe fremað. WSCp MARK 7.12 & ofer þæt ge ne lætað hine ænig þing don his fæder oððe meder. WSCp MARK 7.13 Toslitende Godes bebod for eower stuntan lage þe ge gesetton;
& manega oþre þing ðysum gelice ge doð.
WSCp MARK 7.14 And eft þa menegu he him toclypode & cwæð,
gehyraþ me ealle & ongytað.
WSCp MARK 7.15 Nis nan þing of þam men on hine gangende þæt hine besmitan mæge;
Ac þa ðing þe of ðam men forðgað þa hine besmitað.
WSCp MARK 7.16 Gif hwa earan hæbbe gehlyste me.
WSCp MARK 7.17 And þa se hælend fram þære menegu eode his leorningcnihtas hine an bigspell ahsodon.
WSCp MARK 7.18 Þa cwæð he,
& synt ge þus ungleawe
ne ongyte ge þæt eall þæt utan cymð on þone man gangende ne mæg hine besmitan.
WSCp MARK 7.19 Forþam hit ne gæð on his heortan ac on his innoð; & on forðgang gewiteð ealle mettas clænsigende.
WSCp MARK 7.20 Ða sæde he him þæt ða þing ðe of þam men gað þa hine besmitað.
WSCp MARK 7.21 Innan of manna heortan yfele geþancas cumað, unrihthæmedu & Gytsung, man, facnu, sceamleast, yfel gesihð, dysinessa, ofermodignessa, stuntscipe.
WSCp MARK 7.23 & ealle þas yfelu of þam innoðe cumað & þone man besmitað.
WSCp MARK 7.24 Ða ferde he þanon on þa endas Tiri & Sidonis;
& he inagan on þæt hus;
He nolde þæt hit ænig wiste,
& he ne mihte hit bemiðan.
WSCp MARK 7.25 Sona þa an wif be him gehyrde þære dohtor hæfde unclæne gast;
Heo ineode & to his fotum hi astrehte.
WSCp MARK 7.26 Soðlice þæt wif wæs hæðen sirofenisces cynnes; & bæd hine þæt he ðone deofol of hyre dehter adrife.
WSCp MARK 7.27 Þa sæde he hire,
læt ærust þa bearn beon gefylled;
Nis na god þæt man nime þara bearna hlaf & hundum worpe.
WSCp MARK 7.28 Ða andswarode heo & cwæð,
Drihten þæt is soð;
Witodlice þa hwelpas etað under þære mysan of ðara cilda cruman.
WSCp MARK 7.29 Þa sæde he hyre
for þære spræce, ga nu;
Se deofol of ðinre dehter gewit.
WSCp MARK 7.30 And þa heo on hyre hus eode heo gemette þæt mæden on hyre bedde licgende & þone deofol utgan.
WSCp MARK 7.31 And eft he eode of Tira gemærum & com þurh Sidonem to þære Galileiscan Sæ betwux midde endas Decapoleos.
WSCp MARK 7.32 & hi læddon him ænne deafne & dumbne, & hine bædon þæt he his hand him on sette.
WSCp MARK 7.33 Ða nam he hine onsundran of þære menigu, & his fingras on his earan dyde & spætende his tungan onhran. WSCp MARK 7.34 & on þone heofon behealdende geomrode & cwæð,
Effeta, þæt is, on ure geþeode sy þu ontyned.
WSCp MARK 7.35 And sona wurdon his earan geopenode,
& his tungan bend wearð unslyped
& he rihte spræc.
WSCp MARK 7.36 And he bead him þæt hi hit nanum men ne sædon;
Soþlice swa he him swiþor bebead, swa hi swiðor bodedon. WSCp MARK 7.37 & þæs þe ma wundredon & cwædon,
ealle þing he wel dyde;
& he dyde þæt deafe gehyrdon & dumbe spræcon.
WSCp MARK 8.1 Eft on þam dagum him wæs mid micel menigu
& næfdon hwæt hi æton.
WSCp MARK 8.2 Þa cwæþ he tosomne geclypedum his leorningcnihtum,
ic gemiltsige þysse menegu forþam hi þry dagas me geanbidiað & nabbað hwæt hi eton.
WSCp MARK 8.3 Gif ic hi fæstende to hyra husum læte, be wege hi geteorigeað.
WSCp MARK 8.4 Sume hi comon feorran.
& þa andswarodan him his leorningcnihtas,
hwanon mæg ænig man þas mid hlafum on þisum westene gefyllan?
WSCp MARK 8.5 Þa axode he hi,
hu fela hlafa hæbbe ge;
Hi cwædon,
seofan.
WSCp MARK 8.6 Ða het he sittan þa menegu ofer þa eorþan; And nam þa seofon hlafas & Gode þancode; & hi bræc & sealde his leorningcnihtum þæt hi toforan him asetton,
